title: Gifting Center Not Working
body: Whenever I Go To The Store Everything Else Works Fine, But When I Click on Gifting Center It Keeps Giving Me An Error Has Occurred Message, Is This Happening To Anybody Else?

replies.body: I am also getting the error "You haven't been friends for quite enough time yet" error despite just gifting my friend something two days ago. It's very frustrating, as she has really been looking forward to the Lunar Revel skins that just came out.
exchange.storeprocessor.chat.notFriends is what pops up for me.
This should be resolved! Lemme know if you're still having issues! ^-^
riot katey khaos posted on a very similar post to this one saying they are aware of the bug and are 'investigating'
Also happening for me on skins tab, bundles tab, and purchases tab

I'm trying to gift a mystery skin to my friend and it won't let me - "You haven't been friends for quite enough time yet."

I have never removed him from my list, nor muted or blocked him. This makes no sense, especially considering our very long (years-long) history of gifting each other.
